text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia silesui is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
European waters (ERMS scope)
text.References: Nofroni I., 1988, Two new Odostomia from the Mediterranean La Conchiglia  20 (234-235): 10-11, 15
